pr_title: Fix the issue 10280: Readme content of StorageBlob is unclear and  inconsistencey

timeline.message: Fix the issue 10280: Readme content of StorageBlob is unclear and inconsistencey

timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -165,6 +165,7 @@ or
 
 <!-- embedme ./src/samples/java/com/azure/storage/blob/ReadmeSamples.java#L34-L36 -->
 ```java
+// Only one "?" is needed here. If the sastoken starts with "?", please removing one "?".
 BlobServiceClient blobServiceClient = new BlobServiceClientBuilder()
     .endpoint("<your-storage-account-url>" + "?" + "<your-sasToken>")
     .buildClient();

replies.bodyText: Hi, I've run the command mvn package -DskipTests -Dreadme-codesnippet{-windows} -f {target POM}. However, it reported error, please check. Thanks.
replies.author: Melanie-Ma

replies.bodyText:
I have used the released version dependency for azure-storage, so that I could run the commad you provided.
Also, I download NodeJs to run this command npx embedme README.md and these README code samples are generated.
replies.author: Melanie-Ma

timeline.message: fix the issue of pr build
update README.md by using the command npx embedme README.md
